00004 #ifndef _XVLIST_H_
00005 #define _XVLIST_H_
00006 
00016 class XVNode {
00017 
00018   public:
00019 
00020    XVNode * succ;
00021 
00022    XVNode() { succ = NULL; };
00023 };
00024 
00028 class XVList {
00029 
00030  protected:
00031   
00032   int          count;
00033   XVNode  *head;
00034   
00035  public:
00036   
00037   XVList() { head=NULL; count=0; };
00038   
00039   int  list_length() { return count; }
00040 
00041   void append(XVNode * new_node) { 
00042     
00043     XVNode * ptr = head; 
00044     count++;
00045     new_node->succ = NULL;
00046     if(!head){ head = new_node; return; }
00047     while( ptr->succ ) { ptr = (ptr->succ); }
00048     ptr->succ = new_node;
00049   };
00050   
00051   void remove(XVNode * rem_node) {
00052     
00053     XVNode *ptr=head;
00054     if(head == rem_node){
00055       head = head->succ; 
00056       count--; 
00057       return;
00058     }
00059     
00060     while(ptr && ptr->succ != rem_node) 
00061       ptr = ptr->succ;
00062     
00063     if(ptr){
00064       ptr->succ = (ptr->succ)->succ;
00065       count--;
00066     }
00067   };
00068 
00069   bool contains(XVNode * check) {
00070     
00071     XVNode * ptr = head;
00072     while( ptr ) { 
00073       if( ptr == check ) return true;
00074       ptr = ptr->succ;
00075     }
00076     return false;
00077   };
00078 
00079   bool empty() { return count > 0 ? false : true; };
00080 };
00081 
00082 #endif
